description: Canonical output schema for tier models. Outputs are descriptive, non-decisional, and workflow-support only.

tier.description: Tier selected by tier_classifier for workflow routing only

input_hash.description: Deterministic hash of read-only input signals for audit & reproducibility

created_at_utc.description: UTC timestamp of tier model execution

LOW.description: Tier LOW output – minimal review intensity indicator

review_intensity_score.description: Descriptive indicator of human review effort. NOT confidence, NOT approval.

MID.description: Tier MID output – moderate review intensity indicator

review_intensity_score.description: Descriptive indicator of increased human review effort. NOT risk score.

HIGH.description: Tier HIGH output – escalation intensity indicator

escalation_intensity_score.description: Descriptive indicator for escalation / senior review. NOT approval or rejection.

legal_disclaimer: Tier model outputs are workflow-support indicators only. They do not constitute valuation, risk judgment, approval, or professional opinion.
